name: An incandescent empathy prism
data: It increases the users intelligence a good amount.
It increases the users charisma a tiny bit.
It has non-existent armour class for its type (non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration impressively.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'psionic efficiency'.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It gives decent bonus to the skill 'art of telepathy'.
It gives decent bonus to the spell 'mental illusions'.
It increases the users psionic resistance strongly.
The facets of the prism can both transmit and record signals.  The crystal
can be rotated so that a different facet faces forward from the user.  Each
facet has a subtly distinctive color.
